name: OneShot (itch)
description:
Pong meets billiards in this tactical mutiplayer arcade game.

Controls are with mouse or an xinput-compatible controller. Two players can play on either side of a single controller.

You can only move your puck when all three front lights are lit. 1 light refills with every bounce of the ball, all lights refill instantly when either another player strikes the ball or the ball hits your puck.

Left-click or trigger for a strong shot, right-click or bumper for a weak one.
